name: Ambit Energy
tag_list: energy, energy-company, energy-provider, electricity-provider, affordable-electricity, texas-energy-rates, pennsylvania-electric-rates, nj-electric-suppliers, new-york-electricity-company, maryland-electricity-providers, illinois-electricity-providers, el
overview:
Ambit Energy, http://ww2.ambitenergy.com, is a leading energy company providing electricity and natural gas services in deregulated markets across the United States, primarily marketed through a direct sales channel of more than 200,000 Independent Consultants.

Energy Deregulation The deregulation of energy markets across the country means you can now tap into a $500 BILLION BUSINESS! DONALD TRUMP say’s “AMBIT ENERGY IS ONE OF THE FASTEST GROWING COMPANIES IN U.S. HISTORY AND ONLY JUST BEGINNING TO WALK ACCORDING TO THEIR TOP BRASS” That should mean a lot coming from one of the most wealthiest people in the country! who is also an affiliate of AMBIT ENERGY. Don’t wait for a company to be at its “TOP BRASS” to join!

EVERYBODY USES ENERGY! Over 5 million customers to reach in NY alone. So far, NY, TX, CA, NJ, MD, CT, PA, MA, and IL are deregulated We need energetic consultants there. CHECK THIS OUT! EVERYONE OF YOUR CUSTOMERS WILL RECEIVE A FREE 3-DAY 2-NIGHT GETAWAY JUST FOR TRYING! WITH NO CONTRACTS!! PLUS OTHER BONUSES LIKE CRUISES AND AIRLINE MILEAGE POINTS EVERYTIME THEY PAY THEIR BILLS! And when they pay their bills you get a piece! imagine in a few months when your cust. downline reaches a few thousand and your getting $1 & $2 or more per customer every month… I think you get the point! EVERYBODY’S YOUR CUSTOMER! YOU ALSO WILL BE SAVING THEM UP TO IN SOME CASES 26% OF THEIR ENERGY BILLS!!
